alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Heard; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 7:12PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Carroll, Heard and northern Troup Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from Handy to Ranburne, and moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Franklin, Hogansville, Bowdon, Ephesus, Centralhatchee, Roopville, Corinth, Mountville, Louise, Tyus, Roosterville, Waresville, Frolona, Lowell, Texas, Plant Wansley, Harrisonville, Hillcrest and Wares Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northwestern Georgia. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for west central Georgia.
